materials.raw_text:
As (Arsenic) - 30 g 
 Pr (Praseodymium) - 75 g 
 Sc (Scandium) - 180 g 
 Si (Silicon) - 225 g 
 Sm (Samarium) - 45 g

sourcing.instructions:
As - Obtain from chemical supply stores or specialized mineral suppliers. 
 Pr - Available from rare earth material suppliers or online chemical retailers. 
 Sc - Can be sourced from scientific supply companies or rare earth material distributors. 
 Si - Obtain from electronics supply stores or chemical suppliers. 
 Sm - Available from rare earth material suppliers or specialized metal vendors.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. Grind As, Pr, Sc, Si, and Sm separately into fine powders using a mortar and pestle. 
 3. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 4. Mix thoroughly with a spatula until uniform consistency is achieved.
